div.p: What makes me want to do it is I think what I had gone through from my childhood when I was young, I never really had any
positive male role model in my life to sort of inspire me to move forward and have any direction. From the age of say 15
when I was permanently excluded from a PRU school for naughty kids things just sort of went down for me then and sort of
I just wanted to try and give some support to young kids and try and give them a bit of guidance; I get something from youth work
that I don’t have to pay for in a sense that it’s a natural thing that I just love doing it’s not a job to me.
